verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me, <WH559> saying,
Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> set <WH7760> your face <WH6440> toward the mountains <WH2022> of Israel, <WH3478> and prophesy to them, <WH5012>

and say, <WH559> You mountains <WH2022> of Israel, <WH3478> hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh <WH3069> to the mountains <WH2022> and to the hills, <WH1389> to the watercourses <WH650> and to the valleys: <WH1516> Behold, <WH935> I, even I, will bring a sword <WH2719> on you, <WH6> and I will destroy your high places. <WH1116>

Your altars <WH4196> shall become desolate, <WH8074> and your incense altars <WH4196> shall be broken; <WH7665> and I will cast down <WH5307> your slain <WH2491> men before <WH6440> your idols. <WH1544>

I will lay <WH5414> the dead bodies <WH6297> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> before <WH6440> their idols; <WH1544> and I will scatter <WH2219> your bones <WH6106> around <WH5439> your altars. <WH4196>

In all your dwelling <WH4186> places the cities <WH5892> shall be laid waste, <WH2717> and the high places <WH1116> shall be desolate; <WH3456> that your altars <WH4196> may be laid waste <WH2717> and made desolate, <WH816> and your idols <WH1544> may be broken <WH7665> and cease, <WH7673> and your incense altars <WH2553> may be cut down, <WH1438> and your works <WH4639> may be abolished. <WH4229>
The slain <WH2491> shall fall <WH5307> in the midst <WH8432> of you, <WH3045> and you shall know that I am Yahweh. <WH3068>

Yet will I leave a remnant, <WH3498> in that you shall have some that escape <WH6412> the sword <WH2719> among the nations, <WH1471> when you shall be scattered <WH2219> through the countries. <WH776>

Those of you that escape <WH6412> shall remember <WH2142> me among the nations <WH1471> where they shall be carried captive, <WH7617> how that I have been broken <WH7665> with their lewd <WH2181> heart, <WH3820> which has departed <WH5493> from me, <WH5869> and with their eyes, which play the prostitute <WH2181> after <WH310> their idols: <WH1544> and they shall loathe <WH6962> themselves <WH6440> in their own sight for the evils <WH7451> which they have committed <WH6213> in all their abominations. <WH8441>
They shall know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh: <WH3068> I have not said <WH1696> in vain <WH2600> that I would do <WH6213> this evil to them. <WH7451>

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> Strike <WH5221> with your hand, <WH3709> and stamp <WH7554> with your foot, <WH7272> and say, <WH559> Alas! <WH253> because of all the evil <WH7451> abominations <WH8441> of the house <WH1004> of Israel; <WH3478> for they shall fall <WH5307> by the sword, <WH2719> by the famine, <WH7458> and by the pestilence. <WH1698>

He who is far off <WH7350> shall die <WH4191> of the pestilence; <WH1698> and he who is near <WH7138> shall fall <WH5307> by the sword; <WH2719> and he who remains <WH7604> and is besieged <WH5341> shall die <WH4191> by the famine: <WH7458> thus will I accomplish <WH3615> my wrath on them. <WH2534>

You shall know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh, <WH3068> when their slain <WH2491> men shall be among <WH8432> their idols <WH1544> around <WH5439> their altars, <WH4196> on every high <WH7311> hill, <WH1389> on all the tops <WH7218> of the mountains, <WH2022> and under every green <WH7488> tree, <WH6086> and under every thick <WH5687> oak, <WH424> the places <WH4725> where they offered <WH5414> pleasant <WH5207> aroma <WH7381> to all their idols. <WH1544>

I will stretch out <WH5186> my hand <WH3027> on them, <WH5414> and make the land <WH776> desolate <WH8077> and waste, <WH4923> from the wilderness <WH4057> toward Diblah, <WH1689> throughout all their habitations: <WH4186> and they shall know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh. <WH3068>
